title: Sin with the Sleeping Choir Girls Trilogy
description: This series of stories depicts the sleepy escapades between Eve, Mary and Jemima, a trio of beautiful choir girls, and Pastor Luke, who loves as hard as a man half his age. When each of them, under different circumstances, falls asleep while in his care, he follows what he believes is God's will and gives unto them the gift of his love.Warning: These stories are intended for ADULTS ONLY.
author: Scarlett Skyes
